New Records: Taskin Ahmed took 4/25, his best T20I figures
Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto scored 25 off 20 balls
Paul van Meekeren scored 24 off 14 balls
Taskin Ahmed took 4 wickets for 25 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Taskin Ahmed was awarded the player of the match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Bellerive Oval, Hobart
The match was a 20-over match played under the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23 series
